column1: Local Foods////Local Foods is great! The sandwiches are great and they have really big portions. The sides are super unique. Also
column2: everything is super healthy! The prices are kind of on the expensive side so get ready to pay $9-14 for a sandwich and 2 sides. Parking wasn't terrible. However
column3: the seating inside the restaurant was an issue. There was just so many people eating here for lunch and barely any seats left. Other than that
